item.title: Sorting Series (8): TimSort and Introsort - Engineering Patterns Behind Built-in Sorts
item.description: Explain Python/Java TimSort and C++ std::sort Introsort: triggers, stability, complexity, trade-offs, with skeletons and selection guidance.
